name: MergeGithubPullRequest
description:
Merge a pull request on GitHub.

This tool merges a specified pull request on GitHub for a given repository. It should be called when a user wants to merge changes from a pull request into the main branch. Notifications will be triggered, and users should be mindful of secondary rate limits.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the pull request to be merged.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: extra_commit_message
parameters.description: Extra detail to append to the automatic commit message for the pull request.

value_schema.description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.

parameters.name: commit_title
parameters.description: Title for the automatic commit message after merging the pull request.

value_schema.description: Title for the automatic commit message.

parameters.name: merge_method
parameters.description: Specifies the method to merge the pull request. Options include 'merge', 'squash', or 'rebase'.

parameters.name: pull_request_head_sha
parameters.description: SHA of the pull request head that must match for the merge to proceed.

value_schema.description: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: commit_message
parameters.description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.

value_schema.description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.

parameters.name: commit_title
parameters.description: Title for the automatic commit message.

value_schema.description: Title for the automatic commit message.

parameters.name: sha
parameters.description: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.

value_schema.description: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
